messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Joful Math
messages.msgSnippet: Math anxiety is so real on college campuses.  I went to Penn State and there were always signs up for Math Anxiety seminars, Math Anxiety counseling, Math
messages.messageBody:
Math anxiety is so real on college campuses. I went to Penn State and there were always signs up for Math Anxiety seminars, Math Anxiety counseling, Math Anxiety brown bag lunch talks.

I felt too embarrassed to even go. haha. But I made it through basic college math and 9 credits of college statistics.

Nichole
----- Original Message -----
From: Pamela Sorooshian
To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, July 26, 2003 9:14 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Joful Math


Just supporting and joining with kids in learning and playing with
mathematical processes and ideas, in a joyful way. Lots has to do with
getting rid of parents' own anxieties so they CAN be joyful when in
contact with math stuff.

-pam


On Saturday, July 26, 2003, at 02:39 PM, Sarah K. Groseclose wrote:

> What is "joyful math"? I am intrigued!
